message.content:
Ewe, ndiyakunceda. Ndibhalele isicwangciso esicacileyo sokukhusela iakhawunti yeendaba zentlalo nokusasaza inkcazelo engeyiyo. Ndikwazi ukukunika umsebenzi wokukhuseleka kwaye ndiyakunceda ngolwimi lwesiXhosa.

1. Ukukhusela iakhawunti yeendaba zentlalo:
   - Qala ngokungena kwi-akhawunti yakho yeendaba zentlalo.
   - Faka igama lakho lokungena kwi-akhawunti.
   - Faka iphosayithi yakho (password) lokungena kwi-akhawunti.
   - Beka isakhiwo sokugcina iphosayithi (Remember password) ukuba ufumane ukungena kwakhona ngoku kude.

2. Ukusasaza inkcazelo engeyiyo:
   - Qala ngokungena kwi-akhawunti yakho yeendaba zentlalo.
   - Hlela kwesinye isahluko sokuqala lokunye.
   - Kufumaneka isilungiselelo sokusasaza inkcazelo engeyiyo.
   - Beka inkcazelo engeyiyo entsha ngaphandle kwesilungiselelo sokusasaza.

3. Ukusasaza inkcazelo engeyiyo yeendaba ezimbini:
   - Qala ngokungena kwi-akhawunti yakho yeendaba zentlalo.
   - Hlela kwesinye isahluko sokuqala lokunye.
   - Kufumaneka isilungiselelo sokusasaza inkcazelo engeyiyo.
   - Beka inkcazelo engeyiyo yokugcina ngaphandle kwesilungiselelo sokusasaza.
   - Hlela kwi-sahluko esilandelayo sokuqala lokunye.
   - Kufumaneka isilungiselelo sokusasaza inkcazelo engeyiyo.
   -
